channel.title: npvm - Node Package Manager Visual Platform
channel.description: A modern visual platform for managing Node.js packages. Supports npm, yarn, pnpm, and bun.

item.title: 0.2.0: Version check - compare local build with GitHub latest commit
item.description: Version check - compare local build with GitHub latest commit
